summary: Talked about the upcoming family reunion and reminisced about last year's trip to the lake. Mentioned needing to buy a birthday gift for Sarah.
Discussed the new medication schedule and a follow-up appointment with Dr. Evans. Expressed some confusion about the dosage.
Felt a bit lonely and talked about missing old friends from the neighborhood. Watched a classic movie in the afternoon.
